manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 10.1 inch 1920*1200 resolution large touch screen full HD display android tablet, covered with reinforced 2.5D glass. The tablet's touch panel features a G+G solution that provides a smooth and fast touch experience with 10 points functionality. The double glass layer has good optical clarity and is resistant to sunlight damage and birefringence.

Strong Performance The frequency of the CPU reaches 2.0 GHz, 64 -bit high performance processor. The 12nm FinFET process technology improves the excellent power consumption performance of the MT8183 processor, reducing power consumption by 25% when executing large-scale games, greatly extending battery life. Long Battery Life This Rugged Android Tablet comes with 7000mAh large battery, which supports 240 hours standby, 9 hours video, 12 hours daily use, up to 22 hours music. Equipped with AC100~240V, 50~60Hz fast charging function. (Battery life will vary depending on the specific use of the device). Dual band WIFI + Bluetooth This tablet PC comes with Bluetooth 4.2 and 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi mode, which allows you to enjoy games and movies through high-speed internet connection. Staying at home can be endless fun.

This tablet is equipped with a 5MP front camera and a 13MP rear camera. Dual cameras on the front and back can capture every beautiful moment of your life, you can record the warm and wonderful moments on the go and share them on social media to get more likes. The tablets has 64 GB of body memory, which can meet daily photo and video storage. And also you can add a SD card expand up to 512 GB, always enough space for you. you can download your favorite e-books, games, popular streaming services, blockbuster movies… Built-in Beidou, Galileo, Glonass, GPS, QZSS navigation sensor, allows you to use all available Android navigation, such as Google Maps. A tablet suitable for use in the car to provide navigation help for your travel, you can easily reach your destination by turning on the GPS function when driving or walking.

Entertainment for All High-definition picture quality & high fidenity dual-speaker design gives you a more powerful visual & listening experience when watching movies and listening to songs. SmartPad T10 android 12 tablet is a high-performance gaming tablet, which is a good choice for gaming, watching movies, surfing the Internet, working, shopping, listening to music, etc.
Ideal for Daily Use This great tablet is a great helper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice inexpensive tablet. Right size and has worked well.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a control point for home automation. Since it wasn't going to be used for games, I didn't need the most powerful tablet on the market and could save money. This tablet worked really well.I booted it, updated it, put it in service, and was really impressed with how well it worked. Full Android, not that 'GO' version that is crippled. It ran all the software I wanted and has a nice bright display that can be seen across the room. The touch screen is glass, not plastic that cleans easily when you touch it with cookie dough on your fingers.It has been on continuously for a month or so now and never failed. I have implemented a slideshow screensaver so it also serves as a picture frame when not actively being used. I even mounted it in a wooden frame so it looks nice on the wall. It's become a very useful part of the household.I don't know about the gaming capabilities, but the horsepower in this device is more than I need for its intended purpose. I will probably buy another for another location in the house. For example, it would be nice to have parts lists, assembly diagrams, and other instructions in the garage when working there; or maybe movies in the tub while soaking a sore back.Nice device and not overhyped at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the product being sold
reviews.reviewText: Coming in at around $80 i have now bought two of these tablets. They are 3gb RAM with 64gb internal storage and there is expansion for SD/TFIt is only wifi, and is android 11, however battery life is exceedingly long even when kept with screen on and high brightness all day, running a few apps for work. Sound is nothing special, and display can be a bit dim on some view angles but i got one of these and two other higher grade tablets on the market and both of the higher end ones have been pieces of junk and hardware issuses / turns into a paperweight. This tablet had half of their ram capacity yet kept the pace when those machines even functioned correctly. I have since returned those others and got more of this model.seems like a nice solid aluminum body as welloh and the camera is pretty crap, wouldnt put any bets on this being anything more than a general purpose / workdesk tablet that sticks to light multi-tasking for a full days battery life no sweat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The speed of this tablet is exactly what it's supposed to be
reviews.reviewText: I spent days and days looking for a tablet. I wasn't picky at all. Just wanted one with decent speed and a good picture. After buying one, I sent it back a day later because the thing didn't move at all..so I found out fast all of them will say the speed and it'll be fast, but when you physically get it, it won't be fast. Then I found this tablet..it said all the same things as the ones I looked at before. But it is exactly what it says it is. I recommend this tablet 100%.FYI: I've only had it three days so I hope I'm still this certain a few months from now:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the money!!
reviews.reviewText: I was completely in shock how great this tablet was when I got iI. Definitely worth the money. Best tablet I've ever owned that. Better than name brand in my opinion. Love it! 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only had a couple months. Charging port is broken already. 2nd 1 I've gotten BTW
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought my daughter this tablet for Xmas. The 1st 1 we got had problems and had to send it back. Here we are a few months later after we'd gotten her a 2nd tablet and now this tablet's charger port is gone out on it. e always charge the tablet for her & are very gentle with putting in the charger. This is not a product I'd recommend. I guess since it's been more than like 90days there's no option for me to send this back for an exchange or a refund. I would not buy this product. The quality is very poor, and there are better options for the same price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricewise it's a good purchase
reviews.reviewText: Picture quality is good. Good for checking email and play games ha ha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very sharp picture
reviews.reviewText: this little guy has enough memory to run my exercise program without issues.
Setup was easy, very well built solid, not a big fan of were the buttons are situated but no biggy. Very happy so far wish it came with a case.

From a little known company comes what is perhaps the greatest bargain 10" Android tablet you can buy.I was a bit skeptical about this unknown brand but after reading reviews and checking specs I decided that its was worth a go, and I'm glad I did.My trusty Lenovo TB-X705F was starting to show its age and struggled to play any of the more modern demanding Android games like Northgard and XCOM2 Collection and I found my S20 just didn't have the screen real estate to do those justice. This has been the near perfect replacement and realistically lives up to the hype of the glowing 4 and 5 star reviews.The MediaTek 8183 CPU & Mali-G72 MP3 GPU (AKA Helio P60) provide enough oomph for a great tablet experience. Considering this is the same chipset used in the Amazon Fire HD 10 (2021) which is often recommended as a good mid range gaming tablet but with full access to the Google Play store catalog; & you've got yourself a winning combonation.Aesthetically the tablet is solid. And I do mean literally. Its not what one would call a 'cheap' feeling device, rather its devoid of anything plastic that might have implied its entry level cost. Its vibrant 1920x1200 screen and metal back add up to a pretty hefty weight which might be off putting for some but I personally don't mind it at all.Gaming performance was largely positive and I had no trouble running Asphalt 9 Legends, Northgard and most popular emulators. Game streaming with Xbox GamePass & Steam Link were both positive too and I've not hit any issues with WIFI connectivity as others have complained about. Its WIFI performance is better (IMHO) then my older Lenovo tablet.However, it did not have quite enough power to run XCOM2 Collection. Unfortunately that game just tends to crash whereas my Samsung S20 can play it without issue, so you'll probably be able to play most of the games out now, though some more demanding games may still be out of reach. Overall though, considering the price its still a winner. Gaming is largely a positive experience and the tablet stays cool and quiet throughout hours of gaming sessions.My primary knock against this would be that the 60hz screen does tend to feel a bit pedestrian after using the Samsung S20's wonderful 120hz screen. Its not a dealbreaker buy any means, games are still enjoyable; but anyone one who's gone from 60hz to 90hz or better will know the difference. Still for everything else, reading or media consumption its more then enough. Also the placement of the headphone jack (on top) seems a bit odd but nothing BT headphones won't easily make a non issue. Last, it runs Android 12 which is great but support and updates remain an unknown, only time will tell.Overall this is a steal of deal. It'll likely beat out more expensive tablets with Unisoc T6xx processors lower screen resolution and give you a similar tablet experience to the Amazon Fire HD 10 (plus access to the entire Google Play catalog)For those who are ingrained in the Amazon ecosystem the Amazon Fire HD 10 maybe the better device but other then app catalog and obvious design differences its really a coin toss.

A surprisingly well made, very reasonably priced tablet that's fast and has a crystal sharp display with vivid colours. For the price, I don't think an iPad would be a match for it, nor would I pay the extra for one. A bargain, so I'm extremely pleased!
It has a metal case. Looks and works better than expected. I usually use it for streaming. I highly recommend this.

I used this tablet to read with Kindle App before bed. That's all. Charge it on my night table every week, and today after 11 months it did not turn on nor charge anymore. Totally dead. Better invest in something better that will last at least a couple of years.
